message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: Display Name is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_TARGET_SYSTEM
message.locale: A Target System must be specified when creating a Remote System.

message.name: ERR_FV_TARGET_SYSTEM_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: The Target System %1s is already associated to a Remote System.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_MODIFY_TARGET_SYSTEM_STATUS
message.locale: The Remote System, %1s, cannot be canceled as its associated Remote System is active.

message.name: ERR_FV_SYSTEM_NAME_CANNOT_BE_CORE_CURAM
message.locale: Remote System name cannot be 'CORE_CURAM' as this is an internal value.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REMOTESYSTEM_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The remote system, %1s, cannot be deleted as it is associated to one or more services.

message.name: ERR_FV_ROOT_URL_MUST_BE_VALID
message.locale: The Root URL must be a valid URL format and end in a '/'.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICE_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The service, %1s, has already been added to the remote system.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_URL_EXTENSION
message.locale: The URL Extension specified is invalid. The valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. Spaces are not allowed.

message.name: ERR_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The description entered is too long (%1s), maximum allowed is %2s.
